com.droptableteams.game.LibECS

Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.droptableteams.game.LibECS.EventManager

  • public class EventManager
extends java.lang.Object
    TODO: EventManager class can currently only accept a single event listener which listens to the same event from the same entity. While this may be acceptable in most use cases, there may be situations where multiple entities might wish to subscribe to a single event from a single other entity. This behavior is not currently supported.

      • removeEventListeners

        public boolean removeEventListeners(int id)
        Remove all event listeners with a matching id.
        Parameters:
        id - the entity id to be matched for listener removal.
        Returns:
        true if at least one event listener was removed.

      • removeEventListeners

        public boolean removeEventListeners(java.lang.String type)
        Remove all event listeners with a matching type.
        Parameters:
        type - the event type to be matched for listener removal.
        Returns:
        true if at least one event listener was removed.

      • removeEventListener

        public boolean removeEventListener(int id,
                                   java.lang.String type)
        Remove an event listener with a matching id and type.
        Parameters:
        id - the entity id to be matched for listener removal.
        type - the event type to be matched for listener removal.
        Returns:
        true if at least one event listener was removed.
